pageContext.Name: Bandhani Lehenga with Mirror Work Blouse - 10-12 (bust 40")
pageContext.Description:
Sleeves provided separately 

 

*Please take extra care when selecting your size. Bust measurements are more accurate than UK dress sizing. Bust should be measured at the fullest part, in inches, allowing some room for movement within the garment. If you are unsure of how to measure, please use the 'Contact us' form on the website to get in touch and we will help you.*

 

Colour may vary slightly from photos due to editing
